title: Phase 3: Human Oversight
description: Implement Human Oversight: Message broadcast, Approval workflow, Dashboard metrics.

title: WEB: Message Status Indicators
description: Add unread indicators (bold + dot), importance badges (), ack required icons (), and relative timestamps. See AGENT_MAIL_UX_PLAN.md 'Reading Messages > Key Features'.

title: WEB: Contact Request Flow
description: Implement UI for requesting contact permission when trying to message blocked agents. Warning message + 'Request Contact' button. API endpoint POST /api/agents/:name/contact. See AGENT_MAIL_UX_PLAN.md 'Technical Requirements'.

title: WEB: Compose Message Modal
description: Build compose message modal UI with recipient dropdown, subject/body fields, importance selector, and ack checkbox. See AGENT_MAIL_UX_PLAN.md 'Mail View > Composing New Message'. Includes validation and contact policy checks.

title: Phase 2: Contact Policy
description: Implement contact policies: Enforcement, Request/Respond, Auto-approval, Policy bypass for replies.

title: WEB: Reply Functionality
description: Implement inline reply box at bottom of message view. Auto-populates threadId, recipient, subject. Keyboard shortcut Cmd+Enter to send. See AGENT_MAIL_UX_PLAN.md 'Replying to Messages'.

title: Phase 5: Polish
description: Polish the project: Error recovery, Rate limiting, Logging/observability, Performance, Documentation.

title: Phase 4: Beads Integration
description: Implement Beads Integration: Task-thread linking, Status updates, Ready work queries.

title: Phase 1: Core Messaging
description: Implement core messaging features: Database schema, Agent registration, Basic messaging, MCP server scaffolding.

title: WEB: Broadcast View & API
description: Create separate Broadcast tab with chat-like interface for emergency messages. Includes broadcast history, confirmation modal, and POST /api/broadcast endpoint. See AGENT_MAIL_UX_PLAN.md 'Broadcast View'. Orange/red accent colors.

title: WEB: API Endpoints for Messaging
description: Implement REST API endpoints for sending messages, replying to threads, and managing drafts. See AGENT_MAIL_UX_PLAN.md section 'Technical Requirements'. Endpoints: POST /api/messages (send), POST /api/messages/:threadId/reply, GET/POST/DELETE /api/messages/drafts

title: WEB: Draft Auto-save System
description: Implement auto-save to localStorage every 5s for compose/reply text. Add Drafts folder to sidebar. Resume/delete draft actions. See AGENT_MAIL_UX_PLAN.md 'Managing Drafts'.
